info.description:
Hello everybody.
Thought about a new interactive. So here we go.

Today we will travel back in time, back to the ancient Rome.
In a time where the Roman Empire was at the peak of its power.

All persons, names and places are fictional but related to the ancient Roman Empire.

You are Gaius, the son of Iulius Augustus. 16 years old and born into a noble and rich family and one day you will be head of the family.
Your mothers name is Aurelia.
You also have two sisters their names are Cornelia (older) and Claudia (younger).
Living in a large patrizian villa your family owns many slaves from all around the empire.

You are befriend with some of the slaves. One of them is a medicus and called himself a alchemist, his name is Archius, well it's the name your father called him.
There is Galla, a sweet girl at the same age as you, which works in the kitchen.
Sira is your mothers maid, she is a bit older then you.
Well there are other slaves, so feel free to add your own characters.


The main story-line is based on the accidantally transforming or shrinking of your father. He wanted a way to get rid of his enemies at the senat and their hanchman without a risk. Archius probably knows a way to let them disappeare unknown to anybody, but it backfires.


Please remember the story takes place in the ancient Rome. Oh and most of all, have fun!
So please feel free and add some chapters

P.S.: GiftPoints are also available for your chapters
